definition: Fu Shuo (c. 14th century BC), legendary sage and principal minister of Shang ruler Wu Ding
surname Fu
tutor
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: King Wuding of the Shang Dynasty once lived here with his Prime Minister Fu Yue.
sentences.chinese: 這裏啊曾經居住過商王武丁和他的宰相傅說。

sentences.english: King Wuding appreciated Fu's great talent and bold vision.
sentences.chinese: 武丁特別欣賞傅說的雄才大略。
